mods.abstract: Mosque of the Kait Bey (15th Century, A.D. 1474) at Cairo; Funerary complex of Sultan al-Ashraf Qaytbay (Qaitbay) adorned with alternating bands of stone or ablaq, tall minaret, and tessellated dome (back); Egyptian men and women mill about on street before mosque; "Zangaki No 335 Mosquee Kaid bey" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
